home.description_1: The security of your space is our priority. With our advanced surveillance system, you can monitor your premises in real time, easily access recordings, and receive instant alerts in case of suspicious activity.
home.description_2: With Guardify, keep an eye on what matters, wherever you are. Configure your cameras, manage access, and ensure that every critical moment is captured and saved.
home.description_3: Take control of your security today.

firstSection.title: A surveillance platform that makes your business security

secondSection.uploadDescription: Upload Recordings. Simplify record collection and eliminate constraints of DVDs and external hard drives. Security operators and other partners can quickly upload recording files for a more secure and efficient management process.

benefits.timeSaving: Save time and reduce record management costs
